name: 9 Tiles
description:
9 Tiles is an edge-matching puzzle game: Nine slots on a square board looking for nine matching tiles. The rules of 9 Tiles are simple, yet the game is addictive and a lot of fun!

Arrange tiles from your inventory on a 3x3 board to create pulsating connections between them while you try to maximize your score. Extra points for connections that wrap around the game board! Earn more than 130 achievements for an extra puzzle challenge and long-term entertainment! Playable in landscape and portrait modes.

The game comes with full instructions, including the details on scoring.
